trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the wind's harp devil remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The wind's harp devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Strong Winds
text: The wind's harp devil has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is an air elemental, wind demon, or similar creature of air, is within 20 feet of the target, and isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The wind's harp devil makes two infernal noise attacks.

action.name: Infernal Noise
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) psychic damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

action.name: Hellish Chorus (Recharge 5-6)
text: The wind's harp devil creates an infernal cacophony. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) psychic damage and 7 (2d6) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Devils are immune to the hellish chorus.

reaction.name: Diabolical Countersong
text: When a spell is cast within 60 feet of it, the wind's harp devil plays a single, infernal note, interrupting the spell. This reaction works like the counterspell spell, except it only works on spells of 3rd level or lower.
